title: Please allow browsing if someone in queue has a LeaverBuster notice
body:
The current LeaverBuster warning (no it's not mine - it's on someone I play with though) prevents you from doing any sort of browsing or chatting in the client, it's basically a modal dialog that you can't do anything about except "leave queue".
I'd like to be able to browse, shop and chat whilst in queue, why would Riot not just allow this?
Riot please can you consider this as a change to the client and the way the LeaverBuster notice is displayed.
